addRelay(string,address,string).details: Only the totem creator can add relays

params.relay: The address of the relay to authorize
params.standard: The standard identifier for the relay (e.g., "ERC20", "ERC721")
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

burn(string,address,uint256,string).details: Caller must be the owner or an authorized relay

params.amount: The amount of tokens to burn
params.memo: Optional memo data passed to hooks
params.owner: The address whose tokens will be burned
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

create((bytes32,uint8,string,string,stri.details: Validates inputs, processes fees, and initializes totem storage

params.allocations: Array of mint allocations specifying initial token distribution
params.details: The totem's metadata including name, ticker, image, and description
params.mods: The mods to attach to the totem for various hooks
params.referrer: Optional referrer address to receive the base fee

createRelay(string,address,string).details: Only the totem creator can create relays

params.relayFactory: The address of the relay factory contract
params.standard: The standard identifier for the relay (e.g., "ERC20", "ERC721")
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

returns.relay: The address of the newly created relay

params.account: The address to query the balance for
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

params.referrer: The referrer address (or zero address for no referrer)

returns._0: The total fee required (at least minBaseFee)
The address of the proxy mod

params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

returns._0: The relay address, or zero address if not found

params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

returns._0: Array of relay information (address and standard)

params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

returns._0: The totem statistics (mints, burns, transfers, holders)

params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

params.tickers: Array of ticker symbols to query

params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

returns._0: True if the mod is licensed, false otherwise

params.perPage: The number of totems to return per page

mint(address,address,string,uint256,stri.details: Caller must be the minter or an authorized relay. Payment is forwarded to the mod.

params.amount: The requested amount of tokens to mint
params.memo: Optional memo data passed to hooks
params.minter: The address to receive the minted tokens
params.mod: The address of the minter mod to use
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

removeRelay(string,address).details: Only the totem creator can remove relays

params.relay: The address of the relay to revoke
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

setLicenseFromProxy(bytes32,address).details: Used by proxy mods to register licenses for other mods

params.mod: The address of the mod to grant the license to
params.tickerBytes: The normalized ticker bytes of the totem

setReferrerFee(uint256).details: Fee must be at least MIN_BASE_FEE

params.fee: The fee amount to set for the caller as a referrer

transfer(string,address,address,uint256,.details: Caller must be the sender or an authorized relay. Cannot transfer to unlimited minters.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer
params.memo: Optional memo data passed to hooks
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

transferOwnership(string,address).details: Only the current creator can transfer ownership

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to
params.ticker: The ticker symbol of the totem

addRelay(string,address,string).notice: Authorizes an existing relay address for a totem

burn(string,address,uint256,string).notice: Burns tokens from a totem, permanently reducing supply

burnedFee().notice: Fee amount that is always burned (set once in constructor, never changed)

coreModule().notice: Address of the core module (handles creation)

create((bytes32,uint8,string,string,stri.notice: Creates a new totem with the specified details, allocations, and mods

createRelay(string,address,string).notice: Creates a new relay for a totem using a relay factory

getBalance(string,address).notice: Gets the token balance for an account on a specific totem

getFee(address).notice: Gets the fee for creating a totem

getRelayOfStandard(string,string).notice: Gets the relay address for a specific standard on a totem

getRelays(string).notice: Gets all authorized relays for a totem

getStats(string).notice: Gets the statistics for a totem

getTotem(string).notice: Retrieves a totem by its ticker symbol

getTotems(string[]).notice: Retrieves multiple totems by their ticker symbols

isLicensed(string,address).notice: Checks if a mod is licensed for a specific totem

marketContract().notice: Address of the mod market contract

minBaseFee().notice: Minimum base fee for totem creation (set once in constructor, never changed)

mint(address,address,string,uint256,stri.notice: Mints tokens for a totem using an authorized minter mod

operationsModule().notice: Address of the operations module (handles mint/burn/transfer)

proxyMod().notice: Address of the proxy mod for license delegation

removeRelay(string,address).notice: Revokes authorization for a relay from a totem

setLicenseFromProxy(bytes32,address).notice: Grants a mod license for a totem, callable only by the proxy mod

setReferrerFee(uint256).notice: Sets the referrer fee for the caller

tickerToBytes(string).notice: Converts a ticker string to its normalized bytes32 representation

totemList(uint256).notice: Array of all totem ticker bytes for enumeration

transferOwnership(string,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a totem to a new address

viewModule().notice: Address of the view module (handles read-only queries)
